verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: had] threatened to impose up to $ 150 billion in tariffs on Chinese products . China responded by targeting $ 50 billion in U.S. products .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] had [V: threatened] [ARG1: to impose up to $ 150 billion in tariffs on Chinese products] . China responded by targeting $ 50 billion in U.S. products .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] had threatened to [V: impose] [ARG1: up to $ 150 billion in tariffs on Chinese products] . China responded by targeting $ 50 billion in U.S. products .
The Trump administration had threatened to impose up to $ 150 billion in tariffs on Chinese products . [ARG0: China] [V: responded] [ARG2: by targeting $ 50 billion in U.S. products] .
The Trump administration had threatened to impose up to $ 150 billion in tariffs on Chinese products . [ARG0: China] responded by [V: targeting] [ARG1: $ 50 billion in U.S. products] .
